dt.patient:
SELECT
	patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.gender:
SELECT
	sex_cd	AS	"patient_gender",
patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.zipcode:
SELECT
	patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value",
zip_cd	AS	"patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.birthdate:
SELECT
	birth_date	AS	"patient_birthDate",
patient_num	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	i2b2miracum.patient_dimension
ORDER BY
	patient_num;
dt.encounter:
SELECT
	encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
patient_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension
ORDER BY
  patient_num;
dt.encounterstart:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date	AS	"EpisodeOfCare_period_start"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.encounterend:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.end_date::date	AS	"EpisodeOfCare_period_end"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, end_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension) AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ageindays:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_days"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:AITAA') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ageinyears:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_years"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:AIJAA') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.admission:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_admitSource"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'AUFNAN%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.hospitalization:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_class"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'AUFNGR%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.discharge:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_dischargeDisposition"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'ENTLGR%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.ventilation:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.nval_num	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code_40617009"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, nval_num
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FALL:BEATMST') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.condition:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd	AS	"condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'ICD%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.conditioncategory:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.modifier_cd	AS	"condition_category_encounter_diagnosis"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, modifier_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'ICD%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.procedure:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.concept_cd	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, concept_cd
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'OPS%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.proceduredate:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date	AS	"procedure_performedDateTime"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'OPS%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.provider:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.tval_char	AS	"encounter_serviceProvider_type_Organization_name"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, tval_char
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FACHABT%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.providerstart:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.start_date::date	AS	"encounter_period_start"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, start_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FACHABT%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
dt.providerend:
SELECT
  b.encounter_num	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  a.end_date::date	AS	"encounter_period_end"
FROM
  i2b2miracum.visit_dimension AS b
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
SELECT
  encounter_num, end_date
FROM
  i2b2miracum.observation_fact
WHERE
  concept_cd LIKE 'FACHABT%') AS a ON
  a.encounter_num = b.encounter_num
ORDER BY
  b.encounter_num;
